ai-ne33:1.1_0: Herein, what is determined that is to say?
ai-ne33:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne33:2.2_0: So guarding the mind with one’s mind,
ai-ne33:2.3_0: mind is the diversity of consciousness.
ai-ne33:2.4_0: With right thoughts of right thought, and they actually patient.
ai-ne33:2.5_0: The thought of renunciation, the thought of good-will, the thought of non-violence.
ai-ne33:2.6_0: if she is aiming to right view;
ai-ne33:2.7_0: Knowing about right view, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering. The knowledge that leads to the cessation of suffering is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering is the knowledge and vision.
ai-ne33:2.8_0: Having understood all choices, consciousness is a condition for rebirth.
ai-ne33:2.9_0: With the cessation of ignorance, there is the cessation of all (volitional) processes,
ai-ne33:2.10_0: dullness and drowsiness, calm, confident, loving, deluded, oppressed, prosperous, dreadful, and shaking off their body.
ai-ne33:2.11_0: all the hards that have been reborn in heaven, and human beings, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm and human beings, they are bound for a bad place, the underworld, hell. This is the end of suffering.
ai-ne33:2.12_0: free of determined, liberated, and mindful,
